org.ptolemy.ptango.lib.xmpp

Class XMPPGateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.kernel.util.NamedObj
      • ptolemy.kernel.util.Attribute
        • ptolemy.actor.AbstractInitializableAttribute
          • org.ptolemy.ptango.lib.xmpp.XMPPGateway
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Executable, Initializable, Changeable, Debuggable, DebugListener, Derivable, HierarchyListener, ModelErrorHandler, MoMLExportable, Moveable, Nameable

    public class XMPPGateway
extends AbstractInitializableAttribute
implements Executable
    This attribute sets up and maintains a connection to a XMPP server. It keeps track of actors within the model that implement the XMPPSubscriber or XMPPPublisher interface and relays messages between those actors and the XMPP server. The Executable interface is implemented merely to make sure that the connection maintained to the server is alive every iteration, before any firings occur in which actors may attempt to publish something by invoking the XMPP.publish() method. This implementation makes use of the Smack library.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Author:
    Marten Lohstroh and Ben Zhang
    See Also:
    XMPPSource, XMPPSink, Executable
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Red (marten)
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Red (marten)

    • Field Detail

      • passwordFile

        public FileParameter passwordFile
        The file that contains the password. If this parameter is non-empty, then it is assumed to refer to a file that contains the password. If this parameter is empty, or names a file that cannot be read, then a dialog is displayed for the user to enter the password. It is up to the user to properly protect the file from unauthorized readers by using the file system permissions. The default value is the empty string, meaning that the dialog will be displayed.

      • port

        public Parameter port
        Port number to connect to. This is a integer that defaults to 5222.

      • server

        public Parameter server
        Server to connect to. This is a string that defaults to "localhost".

      • userName

        public Parameter userName
        User name to authenticate with. This is a string that defaults to "guest".

      • debugEnable

        public Parameter debugEnable
        The flag indicates whether or not to enable the smack library debug If this is true, the raw XML stream will be shown for debug use. defaults to BooleanToken false

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws IllegalActionException
        Attempt to connect to the server and login. Discover subscribers and them as listeners. If a subscriber wants to subscribe to a non-existent node, create it. discover publishers and give them a reference to this attribute. This might change in the future, as changes to running models require actors to register themselves instead of being discovered.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface Initializable
        Overrides:
        initialize in class AbstractInitializableAttribute
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If unable to login, create a node, find a node, or subscribe to a node.
